title: In Deep Voodoo
description: As the annual voodoo festival gets underway in tiny Mojo, Louisiana, health food proprietor Penny Francisco is eager to celebrate her upcoming divorce from her adulterous husband Deke, but when Deke turns up murdered and she becomes the prime suspect in the crime, Penny is forced to rely on the expertise of a sexy, junk-food-loving private detective to avoid a murder rap. Original.
author: Stephanie Bond
